name: Textiles: Intro to Sewing
description: This class is for beginners and anyone who wants to polish their sewing skills! You will complete multiple projects from beginning to end while exploring your creativity and learning concrete sewing skills and techniques that will last a lifetime. The projects designed for this class each cover specific sewing techniques that build upon each other allowing you to learn one step at a time while practicing and learning your new skills as you move through the class.
